fxInfo_citation: V-Dem Codebook (see suggested citation at the top of this document).
fxInfo_clarification: For this question, no limit means the constitution specifies there is no limit on the number of terms and not specified means the constitution does not specify whether or not there is a limit. ”Eligible for re-election” should be coded as ”no term limits.”
fxInfo_ordering: CCP ordering: Asked only if HOUSENUM is answered 2, or if HOUSENUM is answered 3.
fxInfo_question: What restrictions are in place regarding the number of terms members of the lower (or only) chamber may serve?

fxInfo_responses.value: No successive terms permitted, but multiple non-successive terms permitted
Only two successive terms permitted, but multiple non-successive terms permitted
Other, please specify in the comments section
